CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published after the fact in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper October 20, 1973, pg. 19, reads: "Fitting Artificial Muscle - This picture of Charles "Buggsy" Drafts being fitted with a device called an artificial muscle by Fred Doring, brace maker at St. Francis General Hospital and Rehabilitation Center, was taken in 1962 after the 15-year-old youth suffered his neck injury leaving him paralyzed. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Medical brace maker Fred Doring fitting artificial muscle device on Charles "Buggsy" Drafts in St. Francis General Hospital
